Improvements.Improvement: Refactor repetitive code into a separate function
Improvements.Change_Diff:
- /* Repetitive code block for creating DataFetcherFactory */
+ /* Call to the new function for creating DataFetcherFactory */
Improvements.Description: The code for creating DataFetcherFactory is repeated for QueryByExampleExecutor and ReactiveQueryByExampleExecutor. This can be refactored into a separate function to improve readability and maintainability of the code.

Improvements.Improvement: Use Java 8 Stream API for cleaner code
Improvements.Change_Diff:
- /* Traditional for loop */
+ /* Java 8 Stream API usage */
Improvements.Description: The iteration over executors and reactiveExecutors can be done using Java 8 Stream API. This would make the code more readable and compact.
